attributes.action: Make the 21st of October or the nearest Monday a Bnak Holiday to celebrate Admiral Nelson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are looking for a reason to add an autumn bank holiday and Lord Nelson as the ultimate British Hero would be an ideal candidate to celebrate. Children could learn about him as a leader and hero for the week before and then have the celebratery day on the following Monday
